root.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon
root.description: Unlike other games in the series Ghost Recon is a third person, on rails shooter and lacks the stealth element the series is famous for. Game features such as a simple cover based shooting system and blindfire mechanics facilitate the player's jaunt through the streets of a futuristic Moscow. Ghost Recon features a co-op option throughout the campaign, allowing a second player to jump in and out of the action at any point. Two players can also go head to head in the arcade mode and compete for who can achieve the highest score.
